archimate:TechnologyService.name: Hosting Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Shares the functionalities of a hosting provider, typically a high availability and high performance hosting infrastructure that is being comprised, among other elements, of back-end web server instances and application servers for hosting and serving both static and dynamic sites.
Based on DIGIT C Infrastructure Services Provision http://ec.europa.eu/ipg/build/infrastructure/index_en.htm
